basic_info.name: P.S. 108 Assemblyman Angelo Del Toro Educational Complex (04M108)

descriptions: School of Authors Mission and Vision  Our mission is to create a community of thinkers and doers who use their skills and agency to author their own futures and who strive for peace, equity, access, and dignity for all people. At the School of Authors, we will nurture all students' academic, physical, social and emotional growth and ensure their success through thoughtful consideration of each student's strengths and needs, holistic programming, an engaging curriculum that attends to the core pursuits of intellectualism, skill development, identity awareness, criticality of the world around us and joy in our everyday lives. In order to become the best that we can be, we embrace families and the East Harlem community as full partners in loving, celebrating and uplifting our children.

The NYC School Survey is administered every year to students in grades 6-12 and to families and teachers of children in grades K-12. The survey is designed to collect information about each school's ability to support student success.

Response rates show what percentage of the school community actually completed the survey. Higher response rates tell us that the results of the survey reflect the views of a larger portion of the group surveyed.
